nodes.text: R5-L4, also called Elfour, was an R5-series astromech droid who frequently served on Kyp Durron's X-wing during his time in the Dozen-and-Two Avengers.

During the Dozen-and-Two's investigation above Helska IV in 25 ABY, all pilots but Kyp and Miko Reglia, who escaped to the planet's surface, were killed by the Yuuzhan Vong, and R5-L4 was destroyed by a grutchin.
Durron was incredibly saddened by the loss of the droid, whom he had come to appreciate as a true friend.
